entry.title: Faster Laravel Tests With...
entry.content:
I released a package months ago, but never really promoted it much. In this five minute video, if you're interested, let me give you a whirlwind tour of what you can do with it (factories, PHPUnit wrappers, controller/model helpers, etc.)

{% video http://2013-website.s3.amazonaws.com/videos/Laravel-Test-Helpers-Tour.mp4 640 400 http://2013-website.s3.amazonaws.com/videos/screenshots/Laravel-Test-Helpers-Tour.png %}

Download Video

To get setup, just install it with Composer.

```js composer.json "require-dev": {

"way/laravel-test-helpers": "dev-master"

} ```
